en.name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
en.2p: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

zh.name: 出云显世与高天神国
zh.2p: 使装备者的攻击力提高12%。进入战斗时，若至少存在一名与装备者命途相同的队友，装备者的暴击率提高12%。
